summary: Isolated Dev Session Setup with Worktree and Device

message.content:
the task of this session is to continue the refactoring of the app to directly load osrs wiki web pages instead 
    of building them from html and injecting css/js to it. the reason for this revised approach is because after 2 
    full days of trying to get a widget like ge price chart to work we could not replicate the server side behavior
   
    on our app without reverse engineering hell. this approach was abandoned because it is not scalable or 
    maintainable. however the direct loading approach is currently not working. ultrathink a plan to 
    study first orient yourself about this part of the code and its history.

content.thinking:
The user is asking me to study and orient myself about the refactoring of the OSRS Wiki Android app. They want to move from an HTML injection approach to directly loading web pages. They mentioned that after 2 days of trying to get widgets like GE price charts to work, they couldn't replicate the server-side behavior without reverse engineering hell.

They want me to "ultrathink a plan" to study the code and understand its history. I'm in plan mode, so I shouldn't make any changes, just research and understand the current state.

Let me start by:
1. Understanding the current project structure
2. Looking at the history of recent changes
3. Understanding both the old HTML injection approach and the new direct loading approach
4. Identifying what's currently not working with the direct loading approach
5. Creating a plan to fix it

I'll need to use the TodoWrite tool to track my investigation steps, then research the codebase, and finally present a plan using ExitPlanMode.

content.text: I'll help you study the codebase and understand the refactoring from HTML injection to direct web page loading. Let me create a todo list to track my investigation and then present a comprehensive plan.

Review git history for recent refactoring changes
Understand the old HTML injection approach
Understand the new direct loading approach
Identify current issues with direct loading
Review WebView and related components
Check for error logs or debugging information
Formulate fix plan based on findings

1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page
     2
     3import android.annotation.SuppressLint
     4import android.content.ClipData
     5import android.content.ClipboardManager
     6import android.content.Context
     7import android.content.res.Resources
     8import android.graphics.Color
     9import android.util.Log
    10import android.util.TypedValue
    11import android.webkit.ConsoleMessage
    12import android.webkit.JavascriptInterface
    13import android.webkit.RenderProcessGoneDetail
    14import android.net.Uri
    15import android.os.Build
    16import android.os.Message
    17import android.webkit.WebChromeClient
    18import android.webkit.WebResourceRequest
    19import android.webkit.WebResourceResponse
    20import android.webkit.WebSettings
    21import android.webkit.WebView
    22import android.webkit.WebViewClient
    23import androidx.core.content.ContextCompat
    24import androidx.webkit.WebViewAssetLoader
    25import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page.cache.WikiPageCache
    26import kotlinx.coroutines.CoroutineScope
    27import kotlinx.coroutines.Dispatchers
    28import kotlinx.coroutines.launch
    29
    30interface RenderCallback {
    31    fun onWebViewLoadFinished()
    32    fun onPageReadyForDisplay()
    33}
    34
    35class PageWebViewManager(
    36    private val webView: WebView,
    37    private val linkHandler: PageLinkHandler,
    38    private val onTitleReceived: (String) -> Unit,
    39    private val jsInterface: Any?,
    40    private val jsInterfaceName: String?,
    41    private val renderCallback: RenderCallback,
    42    private val onRenderProgress: (Int) -> Unit
    43) {
    44    private val logTag = "PageLoadTrace"
    45    private val consoleTag = "WebViewConsole"
    46    private val managerTag = "PageWebViewManager"
    47    private var renderStartTime: Long = 0
    48    private var pageLoaded = false
    49    private val pageCache = WikiPageCache.getInstance(webView.context)
    50
    51    private val localAssetDomain = "appassets.androidplatform.net"
    52
    53    private val assetLoader = WebViewAssetLoader.Builder()
    54        .setDomain(localAssetDomain)
    55        .addPathHandler("/assets/", WebViewAssetLoader.AssetsPathHandler(webView.context))
    56        .addPathHandler("/res/", WebViewAssetLoader.ResourcesPathHandler(webView.context))
    57        .build()
    58
    59    private inner class RenderTimelineLogger {
    60        @JavascriptInterface
    61        fun log(message: String) {
    62            val elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - renderStartTime
    63            Log.d(logTag, "JS TIMELINE [${elapsed}ms]: $message")
    64
    65            if (message == "Event: StylingScriptsComplete") {
    66                webView.post {
    67                    renderCallback.onPageReadyForDisplay()
    68                }
    69            }
    70        }
    71    }
    72
    73    private inner class ClipboardBridge {
    74        @JavascriptInterface
    75        fun writeText(text: String): Boolean {
    76            return try {
    77                val clipboardManager = webView.context.getSystemService(Context.CLIPBOARD_SERVICE) as ClipboardManager
    78                val clipData = ClipData.newPlainText("OSRS Wiki", text)
    79                clipboardManager.setPrimaryClip(clipData)
    80                Log.d("$consoleTag-CLIPBOARD", "Successfully copied text via Android bridge: $text")
    81                true
    82            } catch (e: Exception) {
    83                Log.e("$consoleTag-CLIPBOARD", "Failed to copy text via Android bridge: ${e.message}")
    84                false
    85            }
    86        }
    87        
    88        @JavascriptInterface
    89        fun readText(): String {
    90            return try {
    91                val clipboardManager = webView.context.getSystemService(Context.CLIPBOARD_SERVICE) as ClipboardManager
    92                val clipData = clipboardManager.primaryClip
    93                if (clipData != null && clipData.itemCount > 0) {
    94                    val text = clipData.getItemAt(0).text?.toString() ?: ""
    95                    Log.d("$consoleTag-CLIPBOARD", "Successfully read text via Android bridge")
    96                    text
    97                } else {
    98                    Log.d("$consoleTag-CLIPBOARD", "No text available in clipboard")
    99                    ""
   100                }
   101            } catch (e: Exception) {
   102                Log.e("$consoleTag-CLIPBOARD", "Failed to read text via Android bridge: ${e.message}")
   103                ""
   104            }
   105        }
   106    }
   107
   108    init {
   109        setupWebView()
   110    }
   111
   112    @SuppressLint("SetJavaScriptEnabled")
   113    private fun setupWebView() {
   114        if (jsInterface != null && jsInterfaceName != null) {
   115            webView.addJavascriptInterface(jsInterface, jsInterfaceName)
   116        }
   117        webView.addJavascriptInterface(RenderTimelineLogger(), "RenderTimeline")
   118        webView.addJavascriptInterface(ClipboardBridge(), "ClipboardBridge")
   119
   120
   121        webView.settings.apply {
   122            javaScriptEnabled = true
   123            domStorageEnabled = true
   124            allowFileAccess = false
   125            allowContentAccess = false
   126            mixedContentMode = WebSettings.MIXED_CONTENT_NEVER_ALLOW
   127            // Enable necessary permissions for iframe clipboard access
   128            allowUniversalAccessFromFileURLs = true
   129            allowFileAccessFromFileURLs = true
   130            // Allow popups and new windows for share functionality
   131            javaScriptCanOpenWindowsAutomatically = true
   132            setSupportMultipleWindows(true)
   133            // Enable focus management for better iframe interaction
   134            setNeedInitialFocus(true)
   135            
   136            // Mobile viewport settings for proper rendering
   137            loadWithOverviewMode = true  // Fits page content to screen width
   138            useWideViewPort = true       // Enables viewport meta tag support
   139        }
   140
   141        webView.webViewClient = object : AppWebViewClient(linkHandler) {
   142            override fun onPageStarted(view: WebView?, url: String?, favicon: android.graphics.Bitmap?) {
   143                Log.d(logTag, "--> WebView Event: onPageStarted() called. URL: $url")
   144                super.onPageStarted(view, url, favicon)
   145            }
   146            
   147            override fun shouldInterceptRequest(
   148                view: WebView,
   149                request: WebResourceRequest
   150            ): WebResourceResponse? {
   151                val urlString = request.url.toString()
   152                val localAssetResponse = assetLoader.shouldInterceptRequest(request.url)
   153                if (localAssetResponse != null) {
   154                    Log.i(logTag, " -> INTERCEPT [HIT] in WebViewAssetLoader for: $urlString")
   155                    return localAssetResponse
   156                }
   157                return super.shouldInterceptRequest(view, request)
   158            }
   159
   160            override fun onPageFinished(view: WebView?, url: String?) {
   161                val elapsedTime = System.currentTimeMillis() - renderStartTime
   162                Log.d(logTag, "--> WebView Event: onPageFinished() called. Elapsed: ${elapsedTime}ms. URL: $url")
   163                Log.d(logTag, "--> WebView Content Info: Title: '${view?.title}', Progress: ${view?.progress}%")
   164                
   165                // Check if page content is actually loaded
   166                view?.evaluateJavascript("document.body ? document.body.innerHTML.length : 0") { result ->
   167                    Log.d(logTag, "--> WebView Content Length: $result characters")
   168                    if (result == "0") {
   169                        Log.w(logTag, "--> WARNING: WebView finished loading but body content is empty!")
   170                    }
   171                }
   172                
   173                // If this is a direct wiki page load, cache the page and inject minimal features
   174                if (url?.contains("oldschool.runescape.wiki") == true && view != null) {
   175                    injectMinimalAppFeatures(view)
   176                    cacheCurrentPage(view, url)
   177                    
   178                    // For direct loading, immediately mark as ready for display
   179                    // This will trigger the completion sequence and hide the loading overlay
   180                    pageLoaded = true
   181                    renderCallback.onPageReadyForDisplay()
   182                } else {
   183                    // For HTML-based loading (if any remains), use the old flow
   184                    pageLoaded = true
   185                    renderCallback.onWebViewLoadFinished()
   186                }
   187                
   188                super.onPageFinished(view, url)
   189            }
   190
   191            override fun onRenderProcessGone(view: WebView?, detail: RenderProcessGoneDetail?): Boolean {
   192                val crashDetails = if (Build.VERSION.SDK_INT >= Build.VERSION_CODES.O && detail?.didCrash() == true) {
   193                    "CRASHED"
   194                } else {
   195                    "KILLED_BY_OS_OR_OTHER"
   196                }
   197                Log.e(logTag, "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!")
   198                Log.e(logTag, "!!! WebView RENDERER PROCESS GONE. Reason: $crashDetails")
   199                Log.e(logTag, "!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!")
   200                return true
   201            }
   202        }
   203        
   204        webView.webChromeClient = object : WebChromeClient() {
   205            override fun onProgressChanged(view: WebView?, newProgress: Int) {
   206                super.onProgressChanged(view, newProgress)
   207                val elapsed = System.currentTimeMillis() - renderStartTime
   208                val cappedProgress = newProgress.coerceAtMost(95)
   209                Log.d(logTag, "--> WebView Progress: ${newProgress}%. Capped at ${cappedProgress}%. Elapsed: ${elapsed}ms.")
   210                
   211                // For direct loading, map WebView progress (0-100%) to UI progress (10-95%)
   212                // Start from 10% (initial state) and cap at 95% to leave room for completion
   213                val uiProgress = 10 + (cappedProgress * 0.85).toInt()
   214                if (uiProgress < 100) {
   215                    onRenderProgress(uiProgress)
   216                }
   217            }
   218
   219            override fun onReceivedTitle(view: WebView?, title: String?) {
   220                super.onReceivedTitle(view, title)
   221                title?.let { onTitleReceived(it) }
   222            }
   223
   224            override fun onConsoleMessage(consoleMessage: ConsoleMessage?): Boolean {
   225                consoleMessage?.let {
   226                    val message = "[${consoleMessage.sourceId()}:${consoleMessage.lineNumber()}] ${consoleMessage.message()}"
   227                    
   228                    // Log clipboard-related errors with higher visibility
   229                    if (message.contains("clipboard", ignoreCase = true) || 
   230                        message.contains("copy", ignoreCase = true) ||
   231                        message.contains("navigator.clipboard", ignoreCase = true)) {
   232                        Log.e("$consoleTag-CLIPBOARD", "CLIPBOARD ERROR: $message")
   233                    }
   234                    
   235                    when (consoleMessage.messageLevel()) {
   236                        ConsoleMessage.MessageLevel.ERROR -> Log.e(consoleTag, message)
   237                        ConsoleMessage.MessageLevel.WARNING -> Log.w(consoleTag, message)
   238                        else -> Log.i(consoleTag, message)
   239                    }
   240                }
   241                return true
   242            }
   243
   244            /**
   245             * Intercepts window.open() calls from cross-origin iframes, including
   246             * the "Watch on YouTube" button in YouTube embedded videos.
   247             */
   248            override fun onCreateWindow(
   249                view: WebView?,
   250                isDialog: Boolean,
   251                isUserGesture: Boolean,
   252                resultMsg: Message?
   253            ): Boolean {
   254                Log.d(managerTag, "onCreateWindow called - intercepting new window request")
   255                
   256                // Create a temporary WebView to receive the URL from the window.open() request
   257                val tempWebView = WebView(view!!.context)
   258                
   259                // Set a WebViewClient on the temporary WebView to intercept the navigation
   260                tempWebView.webViewClient = object : WebViewClient() {
   261                    @Suppress("DEPRECATION") // For older Android versions
   262                    override fun shouldOverrideUrlLoading(view: WebView, url: String): Boolean {
   263                        Log.d(managerTag, "Intercepted new window URL: $url")
   264                        // Pass the URL to our existing link handler to open externally
   265                        linkHandler.processUri(Uri.parse(url))
   266                        // Clean up the temporary WebView
   267                        view.destroy()
   268                        return true
   269                    }
   270
   271                    override fun shouldOverrideUrlLoading(
   272                        view: WebView,
   273                        request: WebResourceRequest
   274                    ): Boolean {
   275                        Log.d(managerTag, "Intercepted new window URL: ${request.url}")
   276                        // Pass the URL to our existing link handler to open externally
   277                        linkHandler.processUri(request.url)
   278                        // Clean up the temporary WebView
   279                        view.destroy()
   280                        return true
   281                    }
   282                }
   283
   284                // The transport mechanism needs a WebView to be sent back
   285                val transport = resultMsg?.obj as? WebView.WebViewTransport
   286                transport?.webView = tempWebView
   287                resultMsg?.sendToTarget()
   288
   289                // Return true to indicate we have handled the new window creation
   290                return true
   291            }
   292        }
   293        
   294        // Enable focus management for iframe interactions
   295        webView.isFocusable = true
   296        webView.isFocusableInTouchMode = true
   297        webView.setBackgroundColor(Color.TRANSPARENT)
   298    }
   299
   300    fun finalizeAndRevealPage(onComplete: () -> Unit) {
   301        applyThemeColors(webView) {
   302            revealBody(onComplete)
   303        }
   304    }
   305
   306    private fun applyThemeColors(view: WebView?, onFinished: () -> Unit) {
   307        val context = view?.context ?: return
   308        val themeColors = mapOf(
   309            "--colorsurface" to getThemeColor(context, com.google.android.material.R.attr.colorSurface, "#FFFFFF"),
   310            "--coloronsurface" to getThemeColor(context, com.google.android.material.R.attr.colorOnSurface, "#000000"),
   311            "--colorsurfacevariant" to getThemeColor(context, com.google.android.material.R.attr.colorSurfaceVariant, "#E0E0E0"),
   312            "--coloronsurfacevariant" to getThemeColor(context, com.google.android.material.R.attr.colorOnSurfaceVariant, "#424242"),
   313            "--colorprimarycontainer" to getThemeColor(context, com.google.android.material.R.attr.colorPrimaryContainer, "#D0C0A0"),
   314            "--coloronprimarycontainer" to getThemeColor(context, com.google.android.material.R.attr.colorOnPrimaryContainer, "#000000")
   315        )
   316
   317        val jsObjectString = themeColors.entries.joinToString(separator = ",\n") {
   318            "    '${it.key}': '${it.value}'"
   319        }
   320
   321        val script = """
   322        (function() {
   323            const themeColors = {
   324            $jsObjectString
   325            };
   326            for (const [key, value] of Object.entries(themeColors)) {
   327                document.documentElement.style.setProperty(key, value);
   328            }
   329        })();
   330        """.trimIndent()
   331
   332        Log.d(managerTag, "Applying theme colors via JavaScript.")
   333        view.evaluateJavascript(script) {
   334            Log.d(managerTag, "Theme colors applied. Proceeding to reveal body.")
   335            onFinished()
   336        }
   337    }
   338
   339    private fun getThemeColor(context: Context, attrId: Int, fallback: String): String {
   340        val typedValue = TypedValue()
   341        if (!context.theme.resolveAttribute(attrId, typedValue, true)) {
   342            Log.e(managerTag, "Failed to resolve theme attribute ID #$attrId")
   343            return fallback
   344        }
   345        val color: Int = try {
   346            if (typedValue.type >= TypedValue.TYPE_FIRST_COLOR_INT && typedValue.type <= TypedValue.TYPE_LAST_COLOR_INT) {
   347                typedValue.data
   348            } else {
   349                ContextCompat.getColor(context, typedValue.resourceId)
   350            }
   351        } catch (e: Resources.NotFoundException) {
   352            Log.e(managerTag, "Color resource not found for attribute ID #$attrId", e)
   353            return fallback
   354        }
   355        return String.format("#%06X", (0xFFFFFF and color))
   356    }
   357
   358    fun render(fullHtml: String) {
   359        pageLoaded = false
   360        renderStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis()
   361        Log.d(logTag, "==> Event: render() called. Starting timer.")
   362        Log.d(logTag, "==> HTML Preview (first 200 chars): ${fullHtml.take(200)}...")
   363        Log.d(logTag, "==> HTML contains <body>: ${fullHtml.contains("<body")}")
   364        Log.d(logTag, "==> HTML contains content: ${fullHtml.contains("content", ignoreCase = true)}")
   365        
   366        // MediaWiki will now load modules naturally from the correct domain
   367        
   368        val baseUrl = "https://$localAssetDomain/"
   369        Log.d(logTag, ">>> Calling webView.loadDataWithBaseURL()... (HTML size: ${fullHtml.length} chars, BaseURL: $baseUrl)")
   370        
   371        
   372        webView.loadDataWithBaseURL(
   373            baseUrl,
   374            fullHtml,
   375            "text/html",
   376            "UTF-8",
   377            null
   378        )
   379        Log.d(logTag, "<<< Returned from webView.loadDataWithBaseURL().")
   380    }
   381
   382    // New method for direct wiki page loading
   383    fun loadUrlDirectly(url: String) {
   384        pageLoaded = false
   385        renderStartTime = System.currentTimeMillis()
   386        Log.d(logTag, "==> Event: loadUrlDirectly() called for: $url")
   387        
   388        webView.loadUrl(url)
   389        Log.d(logTag, "<<< Returned from webView.loadUrl().")
   390    }
   391
   392
   393    private fun revealBody(onComplete: () -> Unit) {
   394        val revealBodyJs = "document.body.style.visibility = 'visible';"
   395        webView.evaluateJavascript(revealBodyJs) {
   396            // This completion handler for evaluateJavascript runs after the JS has executed.
   397            onComplete()
   398        }
   399    }
   400    
   401    /**
   402     * Inject minimal app-specific features into a directly loaded wiki page
   403     * Only includes non-invasive theme integration and clipboard functionality
   404     */
   405    private fun injectMinimalAppFeatures(webView: WebView?) {
   406        webView ?: return
   407        
   408        Log.d(logTag, "Injecting minimal app features into wiki page")
   409        
   410        // Apply theme colors via CSS variables (non-invasive)
   411        applyThemeColors(webView) {
   412            Log.d(logTag, "Theme colors applied to wiki page")
   413        }
   414        
   415        // Enhance clipboard functionality with native bridge
   416        val clipboardBridgeIntegration = """
   417            (function() {
   418                // Enhance existing copy functionality with our native bridge
   419                if (window.ClipboardBridge && window.ClipboardBridge.writeText) {
   420                    // Override any existing clipboard functionality to use our bridge
   421                    if (navigator.clipboard && navigator.clipboard.writeText) {
   422                        const originalWriteText = navigator.clipboard.writeText;
   423                        navigator.clipboard.writeText = function(text) {
   424                            try {
   425                                if (window.ClipboardBridge.writeText(text)) {
   426                                    return Promise.resolve();
   427                                } else {
   428                                    return originalWriteText.call(this, text);
   429                                }
   430                            } catch (e) {
   431                                return originalWriteText.call(this, text);
   432                            }
   433                        };
   434                    }
   435                }
   436            })();
   437        """.trimIndent()
   438        
   439        webView.evaluateJavascript(clipboardBridgeIntegration) { 
   440            Log.d(logTag, "Clipboard bridge integration completed")
   441        }
   442    }
   443    
   444    /**
   445     * Cache the current page HTML for offline access
   446     */
   447    private fun cacheCurrentPage(webView: WebView, url: String) {
   448        webView.evaluateJavascript("document.documentElement.outerHTML") { html ->
   449            // Remove JavaScript wrapper quotes and unescape the HTML
   450            val cleanHtml = html?.let { 
   451                if (it.startsWith("\"") && it.endsWith("\"")) {
   452                    it.substring(1, it.length - 1)
   453                        .replace("\\\"", "\"")
   454                        .replace("\\n", "\n")
   455                        .replace("\\r", "\r")
   456                        .replace("\\t", "\t")
   457                        .replace("\\\\", "\\")
   458                } else {
   459                    it
   460                }
   461            }
   462            
   463            if (!cleanHtml.isNullOrEmpty()) {
   464                CoroutineScope(Dispatchers.IO).launch {
   465                    pageCache.cachePage(url, cleanHtml)
   466                }
   467            }
   468        }
   469    }
   470}

1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page
     2
     3import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.R
     4import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page.preemptive.PreloadedPageCache
     5import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.theme.Theme
     6import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.log.L
     7
     8class PageLoadCoordinator(
     9    private val pageViewModel: PageViewModel,
    10    private val pageContentLoader: PageContentLoader,
    11    private val uiUpdater: PageUiUpdater,
    12    private val pageWebViewManager: PageWebViewManager,
    13    private val fragmentContextProvider: () -> PageFragment?
    14) {
    15    
    16    fun initiatePageLoad(theme: Theme, forceNetwork: Boolean = false) {
    17        L.d("PageLoadCoordinator.initiatePageLoad: Starting page load.")
    18        val fragment = fragmentContextProvider() ?: return
    19        val pageIdArg = fragment.getPageIdArg()
    20        val pageTitleArg = fragment.getPageTitleArg()
    21
    22        // Immediately set the UI to a loading state with initial progress.
    23        val titleDuringLoad = pageTitleArg ?: fragment.getString(R.string.label_loading)
    24        pageViewModel.uiState = PageUiState(isLoading = true, title = titleDuringLoad, progress = 5, progressText = "Downloading...")
    25        L.d("PageLoadCoordinator.initiatePageLoad: Set initial UI state to 5% 'Downloading...'.")
    26        uiUpdater.updateUi()
    27
    28        var idToLoad: Int? = null
    29        if (!pageIdArg.isNullOrBlank()) {
    30            try {
    31                idToLoad = pageIdArg.toInt()
    32            } catch (e: NumberFormatException) {
    33                // Ignored
    34            }
    35        }
    36
    37        // Skip preloaded content for now - use direct loading for everything
    38        // This ensures consistent behavior and eliminates the old HTML rendering path
    39        // (Disabled preloaded content check)
    40
    41        // Skip HTML content caching check for consistent direct loading behavior
    42        // All pages will load fresh from the wiki
    43        val contentAlreadyLoaded = false // Disable old caching logic
    44
    45        // Use direct loading for ALL pages - simpler and more maintainable
    46        L.d("PageLoadCoordinator: Using direct loading for all pages")
    47        
    48        if (idToLoad != null) {
    49            // Generate wiki URL by page ID and load directly
    50            val directWikiUrl = "https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/?curid=$idToLoad"
    51            L.d("PageLoadCoordinator: Loading page by ID $idToLoad via direct URL: $directWikiUrl")
    52            
    53            // Update UI state for direct loading
    54            pageViewModel.uiState = pageViewModel.uiState.copy(
    55                isLoading = true,
    56                error = null,
    57                progress = 10,
    58                progressText = "Loading from wiki...",
    59                wikiUrl = directWikiUrl,
    60                pageId = idToLoad,
    61                title = pageTitleArg,
    62                isDirectLoading = true
    63            )
    64            uiUpdater.updateUi()
    65            
    66            // PageUiUpdater will handle calling loadUrlDirectly() when it sees isDirectLoading = true
    67            
    68        } else if (!pageTitleArg.isNullOrBlank()) {
    69            // Generate wiki URL by title and load directly
    70            val directWikiUrl = "https://oldschool.runescape.wiki/w/" + pageTitleArg.replace(" ", "_")
    71            L.d("PageLoadCoordinator: Loading page '$pageTitleArg' via direct URL: $directWikiUrl")
    72            
    73            // Update UI state for direct loading
    74            pageViewModel.uiState = pageViewModel.uiState.copy(
    75                isLoading = true,
    76                error = null,
    77                progress = 10,
    78                progressText = "Loading from wiki...",
    79                wikiUrl = directWikiUrl,
    80                title = pageTitleArg,
    81                isDirectLoading = true
    82            )
    83            uiUpdater.updateUi()
    84            
    85            // PageUiUpdater will handle calling loadUrlDirectly() when it sees isDirectLoading = true
    86            
    87        } else {
    88            val errorMsg = fragment.getString(R.string.error_no_article_identifier)
    89            val titleMsg = fragment.getString(R.string.title_page_not_specified)
    90            pageViewModel.uiState = PageUiState(isLoading = false, error = errorMsg, title = titleMsg)
    91            uiUpdater.updateUi()
    92        }
    93    }
    94}

content.thinking: Now let me look at PageUiUpdater to see how it handles the direct loading:

content.content:
1package com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.page
     2
     3import android.view.View
     4import androidx.core.text.HtmlCompat
     5import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.databinding.FragmentPageBinding
     6import com.omiyawaki.osrswiki.util.log.L
     7
     8class PageUiUpdater(
     9    private val binding: FragmentPageBinding?,
    10    private val pageViewModel: PageViewModel,
    11    private val webViewManager: PageWebViewManager,
    12    private val fragmentContextProvider: () -> PageFragment?
    13) {
    14    private var isRenderInitiated = false
    15
    16    fun updateUi() {
    17        val state = pageViewModel.uiState
    18        val fragment = fragmentContextProvider()
    19        val context = fragment?.context
    20
    21        val logMessage = "PageUiUpdater.updateUi() called. isLoading: ${state.isLoading}, " +
    22                "progress: ${state.progress}, error: ${state.error != null}, " +
    23                "htmlContent: ${state.htmlContent != null}"
    24        L.d(logMessage)
    25
    26        binding?.apply {
    27            // Reset the render flag when a new page load begins.
    28            if (state.isLoading && (state.progress ?: 0) <= 5) {
    29                isRenderInitiated = false
    30            }
    31
    32            if (state.isLoading) {
    33                progressContainer.visibility = View.VISIBLE
    34                progressBar.progress = state.progress ?: 0
    35                progressText.text = state.progressText ?: ""
    36                L.d(" - Updating progress bar: ${state.progressText} (${state.progress}%)")
    37            } else {
    38                // When isLoading is false, the page has already been revealed by the
    39                // fragment's callback. This block's only job is to hide the progress UI.
    40                progressContainer.visibility = View.GONE
    41            }
    42
    43            if (state.error != null) {
    44                errorTextView.visibility = View.VISIBLE
    45                errorTextView.text = state.error
    46                pageWebView.visibility = View.GONE
    47            } else {
    48                errorTextView.visibility = View.GONE
    49                
    50                // Always use direct loading - eliminates parallel loading issues
    51                if (state.isDirectLoading) {
    52                    pageWebView.visibility = View.VISIBLE
    53                    if (!isRenderInitiated && state.wikiUrl != null) {
    54                        L.d("Direct loading URL ready. Calling loadUrlDirectly().")
    55                        isRenderInitiated = true
    56                        webViewManager.loadUrlDirectly(state.wikiUrl)
    57                    }
    58                } else {
    59                    // No HTML content loading - all pages use direct loading now
    60                    pageWebView.visibility = View.GONE
    61                    L.w("PageUiUpdater: No direct loading URL available for page")
    62                }
    63            }
    64
    65            fragment?.activity?.title =
    66                HtmlCompat.fromHtml(state.title ?: "", HtmlCompat.FROM_HTML_MODE_LEGACY).toString()
    67        }
    68    }
    69}
    70
